nodes.text: Chedak was a company that produced subspace radios. The modified YT-1300 light freighter known as the Millennium Falcon was equipped with an upgraded Chedak subspace radio around thirty years before the Battle of Endor.

Chedak were first mentioned in The Star Wars Sourcebook, a Star Wars Legends reference book which was written by Bill Slavicsek and Curtis Smith for publication in 1987. The company were then confirmed to be canon when they were mentioned in Star Wars: The Force Awakens: Incredible Cross-Sections, which was written by Jason Fry and released in 2015.
